exchange-form.help: The amount you will receive is an estimation and subject to market changes.

exchange-result.title: Exchange Done
exchange-result.info-fee-help: Please see in Recent Exchanges list.

order-error.user-not-enough-fund: You do not have enough funds in your account.
order-error.user-not-enough-free-balance: You do not have enough free balance in your account.

user-profile.status-submitted-help: Your documents have been uploaded. Our staff will be reviewing and approving your account shortly. Note that account verification process will take 1-2 working days to complete.
user-profile.status-approved-help: Your account has been approved. No further action is required.
user-profile.status-declined-help: Your account verification request has been declined. Please note the following instructions and update your documents: {{ reason }}.
user-profile.status-pending-help: Your account is not verified yet. Please upload the following documents for account verification:
user-profile.status-banned-help: Please contact support@quoine.com to re-open your account.
user-profile.edit: If you would like to change any of your client information, Please contact us at:

fund-disable.demo-message: You are in Demo mode. You don't need to deposit as there is already initial balance in your BTC account for you to try trading.
fund-disable.vendor-message: Right now we only support JPY, BTC, and ETH deposits/withdrawals.
fund-disable.tfa-message: You haven't enabled Two-factor Authentication (2FA) or your 2FA is outdated. For security reasons, withdrawals are not allowed. Please enable 2FA for your account in Menu > Settings > Security, or click the button below.
fund-disable.status-submitted-message: You have submitted documents for account verification. Your documents are being reviewed by our staff. Once your account is verified and approved, you will be able to fund/withdraw.
fund-disable.status-declined-message: Your account verification request has been declined. Please reupload documents in Menu > Settings > Profile according to email instructions, or click the button below.
fund-disable.status-pending-message: Your account must be verified and approved before you can fund/withdraw. Please upload ID documents for account verification in Menu > Settings > Profile, or click the button below.
fund-disable.banks-message: We are not supporting deposits in this currency at the moment. Please contact us if you have any questions.

deposit.guide-note: Please follow this link and make your payment before the deadline:

deposit-bank.transfer-note-step-1: Please make the transfer to one of the bank accounts below. Remember to save the Reference number of your transaction for step 2.
deposit-bank.transfer-note-step-2: Please make the transfer to one of the bank accounts below. Make sure to include the \"Unique ID\" you received in step 1 in your payment details.
deposit-bank.request-note-step-1: Please do not skip this step. If you skip this step, we cannot credit your fund to your QUOINEX account.
deposit-bank.request-success-step-2: Thank you! We will credit to your account as soon as we received the fund. No further action is needed on your side.
deposit-bank.request-success-step-1: Thank you! The \"Unique ID\" of this Funding Request is {{id}}. Please continue with Step 2.
deposit-bank.name: Bank Name

deposit-cash.success-1: Please click on the link below and follow the instructions.
deposit-cash.success-2: You can also find this link in the \"Pending Funds\" list below.

deposit-crypto.title: Please deposit to the address below
deposit-crypto.note-XRP: Ripple Base Reserve is a minimum amount of XRP that is required for every address in the ledger. Currently this is 20 XRP, which will be held as reserve the first time you deposit. Once the minimum amount is filled you will begin to receive the total amount transferred.
deposit-crypto.note-XMR: Please deposit to the Address below and remember to include the Payment ID in your deposit. Failure to do so may result in the loss of your deposit.
deposit-crypto.note-XEM: Please deposit to the Address below and remember to include the Message in your deposit. Failure to do so may result in the loss of your deposit.
deposit-crypto.note-XLM: Remember to take a Memo Type (selectable below) and include it in your XLM deposit. Failure to do so may result in the loss of your deposit.

deposit-error.phone-number-required-for-cash-payment: Phone number required for cash payment.

withdrawal-request.crypto-success: A crypto withdrawal confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please check and click this link within 30 minutes of this notification to confirm your withdrawal.
withdrawal-request.note-INR: Only INR withdrawals to local India bank accounts are supported.

withdrawal-bank.title: Bank Accounts
withdrawal-bank.account-document-help: Bank statement must be no older than 3 months and contain bank name, bank branch, account name, account number, and date of issue.
withdrawal-bank.status-pending-help: You can still submit withdrawal requests with a pending bank account.
withdrawal-bank.edit-help: When you edit a bank, all previous withdrawals should be failed. Also, the status of this bank will be switched to \"Pending\".
withdrawal-bank.remove-help: Are you sure want to delete this bank account? Please also cancel any related withdrawals before delete this bank account.

withdrawal-bank-error.en-bank-account-errors-withdrawal-exist-: An account can not update or delete while having related withdrawals.

withdrawal-address.title: Crypto Addresses
withdrawal-address.add-step-2-help: You need to verify this address. Please check your inbox for Confirmation Token and enter it below.

withdrawal-address-error.address-not-unique: This address is already added. If you don't see it, it might because the process is not completed (eg: verifying). Please wait 30 minutes and add it again.
withdrawal-address-error.address-invalid: Address is invalid. Please check your Address.
withdrawal-address-error.confirmation-token-is-invalid: Confirmation token is invalid. Please check again.
withdrawal-address-error.verification-failed: Verification is failed. Please check your 2FA Code.

withdrawal-error.quantity-less-than-minimum: Quantity can not less than minimum.
withdrawal-error.user-not-enough-fund: You do not have enough funds in your account.
withdrawal-error.withdrawal-cannot-be-canceled: This withdraw can not be cancelled.

fund-bitmex.help-deposit-1: To deposit to your \"BTC (Futures)\" account, we will transfer BTC from your \"BTC\" account to it.
fund-bitmex.help-deposit-2: Please enter the amount you wish to transfer to your \"BTC (Futures)\" account
fund-bitmex.help-withdraw-1: To withdraw from  your \"BTC (Futures)\" account, we will transfer BTC from it to your \"BTC\" account.
fund-bitmex.help-withdraw-2: Please enter the amount you wish to transfer to your \"BTC\" account

fund-bitmex-error.transfer-failed: Fund transfer has failed. Please try again.
fund-bitmex-error.quantity-too-large: Quantity must be less than balance.

volume.title: Transacted Volume
volume.report-success: Report has been sent. Please check your email Inbox.
volume.empty: Accounts with zero transacted volume in the time range chosen above will not be displayed.

volume-error.choose-range-first: Please select \"From\" and \"To\" dates for the email report.

account-manage.help-1: Active (check) an account allow you to fund, trade, and withdraw with its currency.
account-manage.help-2: Deactive (uncheck) an account will hide it from the UI without affect its balance or trading activities (if any).

transaction.title: Transactions
transaction.unavailable: Transactions are not available for this account.
